Export.Routine:
PRTCLNRUS52 ;Отчет для анализа работы прибора ; liv ; q ; Отчет CLNRUS52 + CLNRUS52.xsl + DLL: CLNSPARM007.clsSTART ;================================================================================================================== CREATE(REPID,PAR,USER,%msql) ; create report n (REPID,PAR,USER,%msql) k ^TMP($zn,$j) q ;================================================================================================================== FORM(USER) new (USER) s USER=$G(USER) S Par="^TEMP($J)" k @Par
; период дат s @Par@("PAR1a")="Label : 100 : 200 : 1000 : 300 : Дата от:" s @Par@("PAR1")="DateText: 1300: 200 : 1100 : 300 : t-7 :True" s @Par@("PAR2a")="Label : 100: 600 : 1000 : 300 : Дата до:" s @Par@("PAR2")="DateText: 1300: 600 : 1100 : 300 : t:True"
; список приборов set @Par="" s @Par@("PAR3a")="Label : 100 : 1000 : 1000 : 300 : Прибор:" ;s @Par@("PAR3")="ListBox: 1300 : 1000 : 4000 : 300 : :True:::List" ;Standart set default="0" s @Par@("PAR3")="ComboBox: 1300 : 1000 : 4000 : 300 : :True: "_default_" :List" ;Standart set id="" for { set id=$order(^TMIF(id),1,record) if id="" quit set name=$piece(record,"\",1) ;set @Par@("PAR3",name_$char(4)_id)=name set @Par@("PAR3",id)=name } if $data(@Par@("PAR3"))>1 set @Par@("PAR3",0)="Все приборы" ; ; Флаг "С детализацией по тестам" s @Par@("PAR4")="CheckBox : 100 : 1500 : 200 : 300 : : : 0 " s @Par@("PAR4a")="Label : 500 : 1500 : 5000 : 300 : С детализацией по тестам:"
; настройка формы s @Par@("form")="Отчет для анализа работы прибора:500:300:Формиров.:Выход" q "^TEMP("_$J_")" ;================================================================================================================== ; Формирование отчета согласно заданным критериям (передаются из формы VB) ; Формат PAR = поле $С(3) значение { $C(1) значение $C(1) значение } $C(2) поле $С(3) значение { $C(2) поле ... } ; Возвращает: 0^сообщение^имя файла^программ для открытия файла ( EXPLORER, EXCEL, WINWORD ) ; 100^сообщение об ошибке ; START(USER,PAR) n (USER,PAR) s USER=$G(USER),PAR=$G(PAR) i $G(PAR)="" q "100^нет входных параметров!" ;при выходе из DLL была нажата кнопка Отмена ; ;k ^zz m ^zz("FORM")=^TEMP($j) s ^zz="$j="_$j_" ; $h="_$h s ^zz("PAR")=PAR ;@@@ k ^TEMP($j),^TEMP($zn,$J) s Mas="^TEMP($zn,$J)" k @Mas s MSGERROR="" d INIT i $g(MSGERROR)'="" quit MSGERROR g XML ;------------------------------------------------ INIT ; инициализация входных параметров New mas,str,str1,str2,i,j,pay d PARAM^REPORTSPB(PAR,"mas") s j="" f s j=$O(mas(j)) q:j="" s @j=$g(mas(j)) ; период дат i $G(PAR1)="" s MSGERROR="100^Не определено значение <Дата от>" q i $G(PAR2)="" s MSGERROR="100^Не определено значение <Дата до>" q ; прибор i $G(PAR3)="" s MSGERROR="100^Не определено значение <Прибор>" q quit
XML ; обработка данных и формирование XML ... set flagDetailsTest=PAR4 set r=$char(0) s Mas="^TEMP($zn,$J)" k @Mas S MasXML="^TEMP($zn,$J,""XML"")" kill @MasXML
kill devices if PAR3="0" { // all devices set id="" for { set id=$order(^TMIF(id)) if id="" quit set devices(id)="" } } else { set devices(PAR3)="" }
set @MasXML@("User",1,"DateFrom")=$TR($$extdate2^SSUTIL4(PAR1),"/",".") set @MasXML@("User",1,"DateTo")=$TR($$extdate2^SSUTIL4(PAR2),"/",".") set @MasXML@("User",1,"FlagDetailsForTests")=flagDetailsTest
set nndev=0 set mi="" for { set mi=$order(devices(mi)) if mi="" quit set nndev=nndev+1 set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"Device")=$piece($get(^TMIF(mi)),"\",1)
kill @MasXML@("Epis") set date=PAR1-1,nn=0 for { set date=$order(^TMIFinfo(mi,"Date",date)) if (date="")||(date>PAR2) quit set epis="" for { set epis=$order(^TMIFinfo(mi,"Date",date,epis)) if epis="" quit set record=$get(^TMIFinfo(mi,0,epis)) if $piece(record,r,3)="" continue set @MasXML@("Epis",epis)=record set test="" for { set test=$order(^TMIFinfo(mi,0,epis,test),1,record) if test="" quit if $piece(record,r,3)="" continue // тесты, по которым нет результатов , не берем set @MasXML@("Epis",epis,test)=record } } } set value1=0,value2=0,kol1=0,kol2=0 set epis="" for { set epis=$order(@MasXML@("Epis",epis),1,record) if epis="" quit if $$select^LVBEPVIS(epis,"Y") continue set dateEntry=PLIST(10) set timeEntry=PLIST(11) set dateGetResult=$piece(record,r,3) set timeGetResult=$piece(record,r,4) set dateSendOrder=$piece(record,r,1) set timeSendOrder=$piece(record,r,2) set urgent="" set priority=$piece($get(^TEPI(epis)),"\",15) if priority'="" if $$seldata^LVBCTPR(priority,4)="Y" set (urgent,urgentTest)="Срочно" ;set cito=PLIST(24) set nn=nn+1 set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"Episode")=epis set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeEntry")=$select(dateEntry'="":$zdate(dateEntry,4),1:"")_" "_$select(timeEntry'="":$ztime(timeEntry,2),1:"") set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeSet")=$s(dateSendOrder'="":$zdate(+dateSendOrder,4),1:"")_" "_$s(timeSendOrder'="":$ztime(timeSendOrder,2),1:"") set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeGet")=$s(dateGetResult'="":$zdate(+dateGetResult,4),1:"")_" "_$s(timeGetResult'="":$ztime(timeGetResult,2),1:"") set diffSetGet=0 if dateSendOrder'="",dateGetResult'="" set diffSetGet=##class(TCLEx.Function.DateTime).DateTimeDiff(dateSendOrder,timeSendOrder,dateGetResult,timeGetResult,"m") set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DiffSetGet")=diffSetGet set value2=value2+diffSetGet if +diffSetGet'=0 set kol2=kol2+1
set nnepis=nn set tests="",dateAuth=0,timeAuth=0 set ts="" for { set ts=$order(^TEPI(epis,1,ts)) if ts="" quit set tscnt="" for { set tscnt=$order(^TEPI(epis,1,ts,tscnt),1,recTEPI) if tscnt="" quit ;set dateEntryTest=$$seldata^LVBVISTS(rowid,4) if +dateEntryTest=0 set dateEntryTest=dateEntry ;set timeEntryTest=$$seldata^LVBVISTS(rowid,5) if +timeEntryTest=0 set timeEntryTest=timeEntry set dateEntryTest=$piece(recTEPI,"\",21) if +dateEntryTest=0 set dateEntryTest=dateEntry set timeEntryTest=$piece(recTEPI,"\",22) set:timeEntryTest timeEntryTest=timeEntryTest*60 if +timeEntryTest=0 set timeEntryTest=timeEntry
set dateAuthTest=$piece(recTEPI,"\",4) //$$seldata^LVBVISTS(rowid,7) set timeAuthTest=$piece(recTEPI,"\",5) set:timeAuthTest timeAuthTest=timeAuthTest*60 //$$seldata^LVBVISTS(rowid,8) if +dateAuthTest>+dateAuth set dateAuth=dateAuthTest,timeAuth=timeAuthTest set diffEntryAuth=0 if dateAuthTest'="" set diffEntryAuth=##class(TCLEx.Function.DateTime).DateTimeDiff(dateEntryTest,timeEntryTest,dateAuthTest,timeAuthTest,"m")
if urgent="" { set priority=$piece(recTEPI,"\",10) //$$seldata^LVBVISTS(rowid,13) set urgentTest="" if priority'="" if $$seldata^LVBCTPR(priority,4)="Y" s (urgent,urgentTest)="Срочно" }
if $$getall2^LVBCTTC(ts) continue kill masTests merge masTests=PLIST set ok=0 //s x=$$seldata^LVBVISTS(vts,13) i $$seldata^LVBCTPR(x,4)="Y" s urgent="Y" ;set rowid=epis_"||"_ts_"||"_tscnt set id="" for { set id=$order(masTests(id)) if id="" quit set tc=$piece(masTests(id),$char(2),1) if tc="" continue // обрабатывается ли эжтот тест прибором if '$data(^TMIF(mi,2,tc)) continue if $piece($get(^TMIF(mi,2,tc)),"\",1)="" continue if '$data(@MasXML@("Epis",epis,tc)) continue set record=@MasXML@("Epis",epis,tc) if $piece(record,r,3)="" continue // тесты, по которым нет результатов , не берем // название теста - суффикс , если его нет, то код set test=$piece($piece(PLIST(id),$char(2),4),$char(28),1) if test="" set test=tc set tests=tests_$select(tests'="":", ",1:"")_test
if flagDetailsTest=1 { set nn=nn+1 set dateGetResult=$piece(record,r,3) set timeGetResult=$piece(record,r,4) set dateSendOrder=$piece(record,r,1) set timeSendOrder=$piece(record,r,2) ;set priority=$piece(recTEPI,"\",10) //$$seldata^LVBVISTS(rowid,13) ;set urgentTest="" if priority'="" if $$seldata^LVBCTPR(priority,4)="Y" s (urgent,urgentTest)="Срочно" set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"Episode")="" set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"Tests")=test set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeEntry")=$select(dateEntryTest'="":$zdate(dateEntryTest,4),1:"")_" "_$select(timeEntryTest'="":$ztime(timeEntryTest,2),1:"") set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeSet")=$s(dateSendOrder'="":$zdate(+dateSendOrder,4),1:"")_" "_$s(timeSendOrder'="":$ztime(timeSendOrder,2),1:"") set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeGet")=$s(dateGetResult'="":$zdate(+dateGetResult,4),1:"")_" "_$s(timeGetResult'="":$ztime(timeGetResult,2),1:"") set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeAuth")=$s(dateAuthTest'="":$zdate(+dateAuthTest,4),1:"")_" "_$s(timeAuthTest'="":$ztime(timeAuthTest,2),1:"") set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"Cito")=urgentTest set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DiffEntryAuth")=diffEntryAuth set diffSetGet=0 if dateSendOrder'="",dateGetResult'="" set diffSetGet=##class(TCLEx.Function.DateTime).DateTimeDiff(dateSendOrder,timeSendOrder,dateGetResult,timeGetResult,"m") set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DiffSetGet")=diffSetGet set rec=$get(@MasXML@("AvgTest",mi,test)) if +diffEntryAuth'=0 { set $piece(rec,r,1)=$piece(rec,r,1)+1 set $piece(rec,r,2)=$piece(rec,r,2)+diffEntryAuth } if +diffSetGet'=0 { set $piece(rec,r,3)=$piece(rec,r,3)+1 set $piece(rec,r,4)=$piece(rec,r,4)+diffSetGet } set @MasXML@("AvgTest",mi,test)=rec } } } } if +dateAuth=0 set dateAuth="" if +timeAuth=0 set timeAuth=""
set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nnepis,"Tests")=tests set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nnepis,"Cito")=urgent set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nnepis,"DateTimeAuth")=$s(dateAuth'="":$zdate(+dateAuth,4),1:"")_" "_$s(timeAuth'="":$ztime(timeAuth,2),1:"") set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nnepis,"Cito")=urgent set diffEntryAuth=0 if dateAuth'="" set diffEntryAuth=##class(TCLEx.Function.DateTime).DateTimeDiff(dateEntry,timeEntry,dateAuth,timeAuth,"m") set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nnepis,"DiffEntryAuth")=diffEntryAuth set value1=value1+diffEntryAuth if +diffEntryAuth'=0 set kol1=kol1+1 } kill @MasXML@("Epis") if $data(@MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis"))<10 kill @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev) continue
// последняя строчка - средние значения разницы времен set average1=0 if kol1'=0 set average1=+$j(value1/kol1,0,0) set average2=0 if kol2'=0 set average2=+$j(value2/kol2,0,0) set nn=nn+1 set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"Episode")="Average" set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"Tests")="" set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeEntry")="" set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeSet")="" set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeGet")="" set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeAuth")="" set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"Cito")="" set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DiffEntryAuth")=average1 set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DiffSetGet")=average2 } // средние величины по тестам set mi="",nndev=0 for { set mi=$order(@MasXML@("AvgTest",mi)) if mi="" quit set test="",nn=0 set nndev=nndev+1 set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDeviceAvg",nndev,"Device")=$piece($get(^TMIF(mi)),"\",1) for { set test=$order(@MasXML@("AvgTest",mi,test),1,record) if test="" quit set kol1=$piece(record,r,1) set diffEntryAuth=$piece(record,r,2) set kol2=$piece(record,r,3) set diffSetGet=$piece(record,r,4) set averageEntryAuth=0,averageSetGet=0 if +kol1'=0 set averageEntryAuth=+$j(diffEntryAuth/kol1,0,0) if +kol2'=0 set averageSetGet=+$j(diffSetGet/kol2,0,0)
set nn=nn+1 set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDeviceAvg",nndev,"GrTestAvg",nn,"Test")=test set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDeviceAvg",nndev,"GrTestAvg",nn,"DiffEntryAuth")=averageEntryAuth set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDeviceAvg",nndev,"GrTestAvg",nn,"DiffSetGet")=averageSetGet } } kill @MasXML@("AvgTest"),@MasXML@("Epis") //kill @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDeviceAvg") ;log k ^zz M ^zz("XML")=@MasXML ;@@@ ; S %Ret=$$WriteFileLabTrakClient^REPORTSPB($NA(@MasXML),"CLNRUS52.xsl",USER) i $E(%Ret)="*" q "100^Ошибка:"_$E(%Ret,2,$L(%Ret)) ; Возвращаем: 0^сообщение^имя файла^программа для открытия файла ( EXPLORER, EXCEL, WINWORD ) / 100^сообщение об ошибке k ^TEMP($zn,$J),^TEMP($j) quit "0^^"_%Ret_"^EXCEL" ;"^WINWORD ;^EXCEL" ;^EXPLORER" ;------------------------------------------------ XMLold ; обработка данных и формирование XML ... s Mas="^TEMP($zn,$J)" k @Mas S MasXML="^TEMP($zn,$J,""XML"")" kill devices if PAR3="0" { set id="" for { set id=$order(^TMIF(id)) if id="" quit set devices(id)="" } } else { set devices(PAR3)="" } set mi=PAR3 set @MasXML@("User",1,"DateFrom")=$TR($$extdate2^SSUTIL4(PAR1),"/",".") set @MasXML@("User",1,"DateTo")=$TR($$extdate2^SSUTIL4(PAR2),"/",".") //set @MasXML@("User",1,"Device")=$piece($get(^TMIF(mi)),"\",1) set nndev=0 set mi="" for { set mi=$order(devices(mi)) if mi="" quit set nndev=nndev+1 set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"Device")=$piece($get(^TMIF(mi)),"\",1) set nn=0 for glob=$name(^TMIF(mi,20)),$name(^TMPmif(mi,20)) { set epis="" for { set epis=$order(@glob@(epis),1,record) if epis="" quit if $$select^LVBEPVIS(epis,"Y") continue // test date of entry set dateEntry=PLIST(10) if (dateEntry<PAR1)||(dateEntry>PAR2) continue // test date get results set datetimeGet=$piece(record,"\",3) if datetimeGet="" continue // data set timeEntry=PLIST(11) set datetimeSet=$piece(record,"\",2) // date time sent order to device ;set cito=PLIST(24) set info=$$GetTests(mi,epis),tests=$piece(info,$char(1),1),cito=$piece(info,$char(1),2) //if '$get(@MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"Device"))="" set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"Device")=$piece($get(^TMIF(mi)),"\",1) set nn=nn+1 set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"Episode")=epis set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"Tests")=tests set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeEntry")=$zdate(dateEntry,4)_" "_$ztime(timeEntry,2) set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeSet")=$zdate(+datetimeSet,4)_" "_$ztime($piece(datetimeSet,",",2),2) set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"DateTimeGet")=$zdate(+datetimeGet,4)_" "_$ztime($piece(datetimeGet,",",2),2) set @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev,"GrEpis",nn,"Cito")=cito } } if $data(@MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev))<10 kill @MasXML@("User",1,"GRDevice",nndev) } ;log k ^zz M ^zz("XML")=@MasXML ;@@@ ; S %Ret=$$WriteFileLabTrakClient^REPORTSPB($NA(@MasXML),"CLNRUS52.xsl",USER) i $E(%Ret)="*" q "100^Ошибка:"_$E(%Ret,2,$L(%Ret)) ; Возвращаем: 0^сообщение^имя файла^программа для открытия файла ( EXPLORER, EXCEL, WINWORD ) / 100^сообщение об ошибке k ^TEMP($zn,$J),^TEMP($j) quit "0^^"_%Ret_"^EXCEL" ;"^WINWORD ;^EXCEL" ;^EXPLORER" ; GetTests(mi,epis) set tests="",urgent="",dateAuth=0,timeAuth=0 set ts="" for { set ts=$order(^TEPI(epis,1,ts)) if ts="" quit set tscnt="" for { set tscnt=$order(^TEPI(epis,1,ts,tscnt),1,rec) if tscnt="" quit // priority //s x=$$seldata^LVBVISTS(epis_"||"_ts_"||"_tscnt,13) if $$seldata^LVBCTPR(x,4)="Y" s urgent="Y" if $$getall2^LVBCTTC(ts) continue set ok=0 //s x=$$seldata^LVBVISTS(vts,13) i $$seldata^LVBCTPR(x,4)="Y" s urgent="Y" set rowid=epis_"||"_ts_"||"_tscnt set id="" for { set id=$order(PLIST(id)) if id="" quit set tc=$piece(PLIST(id),$char(2),1) if tc="" continue if '$data(^TMIF(mi,2,tc)) continue if $piece($get(^TMIF(mi,2,tc)),"\",1)="" continue if '$data(@MasXML@("Epis",epis,tc)) continue set test=$piece($piece(PLIST(id),$char(2),4),$char(28),1) if test="" set test=tc set tests=tests_$select(tests'="":", ",1:"")_test set ok=1 set dateAuthtest=$$seldata^LVBVISTS(rowid,7) if dateAuthtest>dateAuth set dateAuth=dateAuthtest,timeAuth=$$seldata^LVBVISTS(rowid,8) } if (ok=1)&&(urgent="") { //set priority=$piece(rec,"\",10) set rowid=epis_"||"_ts_"||"_tscnt set priority=$$seldata^LVBVISTS(rowid,13) i $$seldata^LVBCTPR(priority,4)="Y" s urgent="Срочно" } } } if +dateAuth=0 set dateAuth="" if +timeAuth=0 set timeAuth="" quit $lb(tests,urgent,dateAuth,timeAuth)
